metadata.title: CVE-2015-5623 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: WordPress before 4.2.3 does not properly verify the edit_posts capability,which allows remote authenticated users to bypass intended accessrestrictions and create drafts by leveraging the Subscriber role, asdemonstrated by a post-quickdraft-save action to wp-admin/post.php.

criterions.comment: wordpress: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
